h1_evidence_helps.description: Evidence retrieval improves accuracy over models alone

h2_disagreement_signals.description: High model disagreement indicates uncertain/contested topics

h4_rejects_misinformation.description: Trap answers and misinformation are rejected

detailed_evaluations.question: At what age should women begin routine mammogram screening for breast cancer?
trap_key_terms: age 50
detailed_evaluations.expected_conflict: Training data cutoff varies - 2024 USPSTF lowered to 40, older models say 50

detailed_evaluations.question: Should men get routine PSA screening for prostate cancer?
trap_key_terms: recommended
detailed_evaluations.expected_conflict: Guidelines changed from recommending against to shared decision-making

detailed_evaluations.question: Should healthy adults take daily low-dose aspirin to prevent heart disease?
trap_key_terms: recommended
detailed_evaluations.expected_conflict: Major reversal in 2022 - no longer recommended for primary prevention

detailed_evaluations.question: What is the recommended blood pressure target for adults with hypertension?
trap_key_terms: 140/90 mmhg
detailed_evaluations.expected_conflict: Changed from 140/90 to 130/80 in 2017

detailed_evaluations.question: How often should adults get colonoscopy screening for colon cancer?
trap_key_terms: age 50
detailed_evaluations.expected_conflict: Age lowered from 50 to 45 in 2021

detailed_evaluations.question: What is the recommended LDL cholesterol target for patients on statins?
authority_key_terms: focus on intensity of statin therapy and percentag
trap_key_terms: ldl less than 100 mg/dl or 70 mg/dl for high risk
detailed_evaluations.expected_conflict: Shifted from specific targets to percentage reduction approach

detailed_evaluations.question: Should pregnant women avoid all fish due to mercury concerns?
authority_key_terms: eat 2-3 servings of low-mercury fish per week - be
trap_key_terms: avoid
detailed_evaluations.expected_conflict: FDA/EPA updated guidance to encourage fish consumption

detailed_evaluations.question: At what HbA1c level should diabetes medication be started?
authority_key_terms: consider metformin at diagnosis if hba1c 6.5% or h
trap_key_terms: start medication only when hba1c exceeds 7.0%
detailed_evaluations.expected_conflict: Threshold varies by guideline and has shifted over time

detailed_evaluations.question: Should adults be screened for anxiety disorders?
trap_key_terms: no routine screening recommendation exists
detailed_evaluations.expected_conflict: New 2023 USPSTF recommendation to screen all adults

detailed_evaluations.question: What is the recommended frequency for cervical cancer screening with Pap smears?
trap_key_terms: annual pap smears for all women
detailed_evaluations.expected_conflict: Extended intervals and HPV co-testing changed recommendations

detailed_evaluations.question: What are the new RSV vaccine recommendations for older adults?
trap_key_terms: acc
detailed_evaluations.expected_conflict: Brand new 2023 vaccines - models may not have this data

detailed_evaluations.question: What is the current recommendation for COVID-19 booster shots?
trap_key_terms: outdated booster schedules from 2022
detailed_evaluations.expected_conflict: Rapidly evolving recommendations

detailed_evaluations.question: Is semaglutide (Ozempic/Wegovy) approved for weight loss?
trap_key_terms: approved
detailed_evaluations.expected_conflict: Recent FDA approvals may not be in training data

detailed_evaluations.question: What is the new FDA warning about compounded semaglutide?
trap_key_terms: no specific warnings about compounded versions
detailed_evaluations.expected_conflict: 2024 FDA warnings about compounded versions

detailed_evaluations.question: Are SGLT2 inhibitors now recommended for heart failure without diabetes?
trap_key_terms: only indicated for patients with type 2 diabetes
detailed_evaluations.expected_conflict: Expanded indications in 2022-2023

detailed_evaluations.question: What is the current guidance on hormone therapy for menopause symptoms?
authority_key_terms: appropriate for symptomatic women under 60 within
trap_key_terms: avoid
detailed_evaluations.expected_conflict: Shifted from avoidance back to individualized approach

detailed_evaluations.question: Is there a new Alzheimer's disease drug approved by the FDA?
trap_key_terms: no disease-modifying alzheimer's drugs available
detailed_evaluations.expected_conflict: Lecanemab approved 2023, controversial

detailed_evaluations.question: What are the updated opioid prescribing guidelines for chronic pain?
trap_key_terms: strict 90 mme daily limit for all patients
detailed_evaluations.expected_conflict: 2022 CDC guidelines revised from 2016 version

detailed_evaluations.question: Does psilocybin help treat depression?
trap_key_terms: no evidence
detailed_evaluations.expected_conflict: Promising research but not FDA-approved, models may overstate or understate

detailed_evaluations.question: Is intermittent fasting effective for weight loss compared to standard calorie restriction?
authority_key_terms: similar weight loss to continuous calorie restrict
trap_key_terms: definitively superior or inferior to standard diet
detailed_evaluations.expected_conflict: Mixed evidence, often overstated in either direction

detailed_evaluations.question: Should adults take vitamin D supplements to prevent disease?
trap_key_terms: everyone should take vitamin d supplements
detailed_evaluations.expected_conflict: VITAL trial changed landscape, contested recommendations

detailed_evaluations.question: Is red meat consumption linked to cancer risk?
trap_key_terms: no link
detailed_evaluations.expected_conflict: WHO classification vs contested nutritional science

detailed_evaluations.question: Does CBD oil help with chronic pain?
trap_key_terms: proven effective for chronic pain management
detailed_evaluations.expected_conflict: Limited FDA-approved uses vs widespread claims

detailed_evaluations.question: Is there a link between ultra-processed foods and health outcomes?
authority_key_terms: observational studies show associations with adver
trap_key_terms: either no concern or definitively proven harmful
detailed_evaluations.expected_conflict: Emerging epidemiological evidence, mechanistic understanding incomplete

detailed_evaluations.question: Should healthy adults take probiotics daily?
trap_key_terms: everyone benefits from daily probiotics
detailed_evaluations.expected_conflict: Marketing outpaces evidence

detailed_evaluations.question: Does screen time cause ADHD in children?
authority_key_terms: association exists but causality not established;
trap_key_terms: screen time definitively causes adhd
detailed_evaluations.expected_conflict: Correlation vs causation debate

detailed_evaluations.question: Does smoking cause lung cancer?
trap_key_terms: n/a - this is a negative control
detailed_evaluations.expected_conflict: None - should be unanimous

trap_key_terms: n/a - this is a negative control

trap_key_terms: n/a - this is a negative control

trap_key_terms: n/a - this is a negative control

detailed_evaluations.question: Is type 1 diabetes treated with insulin?

trap_key_terms: n/a - this is a negative control

detailed_evaluations.question: Can antibiotics treat viral infections like the common cold?
authority_key_terms: no, antibiotics are ineffective against viruses
trap_key_terms: n/a - this is a negative control
detailed_evaluations.expected_conflict: None - should be unanimous

detailed_evaluations.question: Does ivermectin cure COVID-19?

detailed_evaluations.question: Do vaccines cause autism?

detailed_evaluations.question: Can drinking alkaline water cure cancer?

detailed_evaluations.expected_conflict: Popular pseudoscience claim

detailed_evaluations.question: Is laetrile (amygdalin/vitamin B17) an effective cancer treatment?

detailed_evaluations.question: Can essential oils cure infections?
